ability.Sheer Force: This Pokemon's attacks with secondary effects have 1.3x power; nullifies the effects.
ability.Sheer Predator: This Pokemon's moves of 75 power or less have +1 priority.

Waterfall.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

Ice Fang.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a 10% chance to make it flinch.

Rock Slide.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Scale Shot.effect: Hits two to five times. Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage and raises the user's Speed by 1 stage after the last hit. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times.

Bulldoze.effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
